009package imagingbook.common.morphology;
010
011import ij.process.ByteProcessor;
012
013public class BinaryOpening extends BinaryMorphologyFilter {
014        
015        public BinaryOpening() {
016                super();
017        }
018        
019        public BinaryOpening(byte[][] H) {
020                super(H);
021        }
022
023        @Override
024        public void applyTo(ByteProcessor ip) {
025                new BinaryErosion(H).applyTo(ip);       // erode(ip, H);
026                new BinaryDilation(H).applyTo(ip);      //dilate(ip, H);
027        }
028
029}
